data.message:
Obviously you don't give a damn about what kind of world your child grows up in, because all you are doing is helping to destroy all decency that is left. You talk about Trump like he is such a horrible person, like people can't change...take a look at yourself and the things you have done in the past that you regret...? Do you KNOW Trump? Do you KNOW whether he regrets things from his past or not? Trump's or any other potus' top priority job is to keep the American tax payers safe, and that is exactly what he is trying to do, even for you and your Family. But it's people just like you and the Trump hating liberal media and the rest of the Democrats that are making his job damn near impossible. You should be ashamed of your self! 
Why don't you contact him and have a sit down so he can help you understand what is really happening here.
